org.boothub.java-groovy.name: Java / Groovy
org.boothub.java-groovy.caption: A feature-rich Gradle-based skeleton for Java and/or Groovy projects.

0.1.0.name: Java / Groovy
0.1.0.caption: A feature-rich Gradle-based skeleton for Java and/or Groovy projects.
0.1.0.description:
A feature-rich skeleton for Java and/or Groovy projects with Gradle build file.

Features:
 - single or multi-module project
 - versioning
 - license header check
 - support for Eclipse and IntelliJ Idea
 - testing with JUnit and/or Spock
 - automatic build and test via [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.com/)
 - support for [AsciiDoc](http://asciidoc.org/) documentation
 - automatic publishing of versioned AsciiDoc and javadoc documentation to [GitHub Project Pages](https://help.github.com/articles/user-organization-and-project-pages/#project-pages)
 - static code analysis with [findbugs](http://findbugs.sourceforge.net/)
 - jar signing
 - jar publishing to JCenter (and from there to Maven Central)

org.boothub.simple-groovy.name: Simple Groovy
org.boothub.simple-groovy.caption: A Gradle-based Groovy project with a main class and a Spock test class.

0.1.0.name: Simple Groovy
0.1.0.caption: A Gradle-based Groovy project with a main class and a Spock test class.
0.1.0.description:
A simple Groovy project with a main class and a Spock test class.

Provides a Gradle build file that adds support for versioning and for checking license headers.
